Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice with top of cul; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; single added red band above single added white band; exterior: painted decoration consisting of bull (part of body, forelegs and chest remaining) to right; below, two dilute lines, above, on cul, metopal decoration consisting of three preserved vertical lines.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0440) (phase 2)
